name: Red Riding Hood
description:
A super cute portrayal of Little Red Riding Hood's journey through the forest on her way to Grandma's house, this cushion will look stunning in any little girl's room. 

Retro but still fresh, the soft blue and red colour palette works in modern and traditional nurseries alike and gives an extra special edge to snuggling up for story time.  

Backed with ivory linen, with concealed zip fastening.

Each 17 inch square cushion is filled with an 18inch 650gram feather pad, for maximum plumpness and "squidginess".  

Please note that in Cushty La land each cushion is handmade with tender loving care so individual products will vary slightly from the photos. Rest assured, though, that each one is a true work of art!

name: Treetop
description:
A melee of warm brown on cream with an explosion of scarlet... this cushion is as yummy as a chocolate ice-cream sundae.  We feel peckish just looking at it!

Crafted from fabric designed by Tina Givens for Free Spirit, the cushion looks fabulous mixed and matched with a comfy pile of Cushty La classics.

Like so many of our hand-picked fabrics, Treetop is contemporary with a vintage twist and fits perfectly into any design scheme.

Backed with dark brown linen, with concealed zip fastening.

Each 17 inch square cushion is filled with an 18inch 650gram feather pad, for maximum plumpness and "squidginess".  

Please note that in Cushty La land each cushion is handmade with tender loving care so individual products will vary slightly from the photos. Rest assured, though, that each one is a true work of art!

name: McKenzie Vine
description:
Super delicate and pretty as a picture, this 'granny chic' fabric  is by Dena Designs for Free Spirit.

A classic floral-paisley combination, this cushion integrates into most colour schemes and is perfect for any room in the house.  The Cushty La team love using it to add softness to a crisp white bed!

Backed with ivory linen, with concealed zip fastening.

Each 17 inch square cushion is filled with an 18inch 650gram feather pad, for maximum plumpness and "squidginess".  

Please note that in Cushty La land each cushion is handmade with tender loving care so individual products will vary slightly from the photos. Rest assured, though, that each one is a true work of art!

name: Buttons
description:
By Robert Kaufman, Buttons has a quirky vintage vibe.  Its soft red-brown, green and grey pattern set off by a cream backdrop make it really easy to blend and accessorise.   At Cushty La we like to put two or three Buttons cushions together on a sofa for extra impact.

Backed with oatmeal linen, with concealed zip fastening.

Each 17 inch square cushion is filled with an 18inch 650gram feather pad, for maximum plumpness and "squidginess".  

Please note that in Cushty La land each cushion is handmade with tender loving care so individual products will vary slightly from the photos. Rest assured, though, that each one is a true work of art!

name: Yeeha
description:
Howdy pardners!

By Michael Miller, this 50s inspired Wild West design is perfect for those little rebels.  For boys or girls, it looks ubercool in any bedroom.  

Backed with black linen, with concealed zip fastening.

Each 17 inch square cushion is filled with an 18inch 650gram feather pad, for maximum plumpness and "squidginess".  

Please note that in Cushty La land each cushion is handmade with tender loving care so individual products will vary slightly from the photos. Rest assured, though, that each one is a true work of art!
